title: Handyman Recruitment Agency website with registration, uploads, admin dashboard, and SEO (no email)

requirements.text: Create the public site pages and navigation for Handyman Recruitment Agency: Home, Handyman Registration, Hire a Handyman, Services Offered, About Us, Contact, Privacy Policy, and Admin.

quotes: ## 3. Website Pages / Structure

acceptanceCriteria: A top navigation (and mobile hamburger menu) links to all pages.
All pages render correctly on mobile and desktop.
Routes are accessible directly via URL without blank screens.

requirements.text: Apply a consistent professional visual theme using the brand colors Black, Yellow, and Navy, with a clean 'trade/industrial' look (bold headings, high-contrast buttons, simple icons) and large clear CTAs.

quotes:
## 6. Design Requirements

* Professional and clean layout
* Colours: Black, Yellow, Navy (Brand identity)
* Easy navigation menu
* Large clear buttons
* Simple fonts

acceptanceCriteria: Primary buttons use high-contrast styling and are easily tappable on mobile.
Typography is consistent across all pages (headings, body, labels).
No blue/purple default theme is used unless it matches the specified Navy tone.

requirements.text: Add the uploaded agency logo (20260211_195621.png) as a static asset and use it in the site header and Home page hero area.

quotes: * Agency logo and name

acceptanceCriteria: Logo file is stored as a static asset (not served through the backend).
Header displays the logo and the agency name.
Logo scales correctly on mobile without distortion or overflow.

requirements.text: Build the Handyman Registration page with a simple form capturing personal information (Full Name, ID Number, Phone Number, Email Address, Physical Address), work information (Trade/Skill, Years of Experience, Areas willing to work in), and document uploads for CV (PDF), ID Copy, Matric Certificate, Qualification/Trade Certificate; on submit, store the submission and show confirmation text: “Your application has been received. We will contact you if shortlisted.”

quotes:
### 2. Handyman Registration Page

Simple online form with the following fields:

Personal Information:

* Full Name
* ID Number
* Phone Number
* Email Address
* Physical Address

Work Information:

* Trade / Skill (Plumber, Electrician, Painter, Carpenter, etc.)
* Years of Experience
* Areas willing to work in

Document Upload Section:

* Upload CV (PDF)
* Upload ID Copy
* Upload Matric Certificate
* Upload Qualification/Trade Certificate

Submit Button

After submission:

* Confirmation message: "Your application has been received. We will contact you if shortlisted."

acceptanceCriteria: Form validates required fields and prevents submit when missing.
CV upload enforces PDF; other documents accept common image/PDF formats.
After successful submit, the confirmation message is shown and the form is cleared or disabled to prevent accidental resubmission.
Submission is persisted in the backend and visible in the admin dashboard.

requirements.text: Build the Hire a Handyman page with a client enquiry form (Full Name, Company Name (optional), Phone Number, Email, Type of service needed, Location, Message); on submit, store the enquiry and show an on-screen confirmation message (no email).

quotes:
### 3. Hire a Handyman (Client Contact Page)

Simple client form:

* Full Name
* Company Name (if applicable)
* Phone Number
* Email
* Type of service needed
* Location
* Message box (describe job)

Submit button

After submission:

* Confirmation message
* Auto email notification to agency

acceptanceCriteria: Form submission persists to backend and appears in admin dashboard.
After submit, an on-screen confirmation message is displayed.
No outbound email is attempted.

requirements.text: Create Services Offered and About Us pages with short, professional copy matching the brief (client services, candidate services; mission, vision, commitment).

quotes:
### 6. Services Offered

The website must clearly display the following services:

For Clients:

* Sourcing skilled and semi-skilled handymen
* Pre-screening and verification of documents
* Recruitment for:

  * Plumbers
  * Electricians
  * Carpenters
  * Painters
  * Welders
  * General maintenance workers
* Temporary and permanent placements

For Candidates:

* Job placement assistance
* Profile registration
* Document submission and verification

### 4. About Us Page

* Short background of Handyman Recruitment Agency
* Mission
* Vision
* Commitment to quality and professionalism

Keep it short and professional.

acceptanceCriteria: Services page lists all requested bullet points.
About page includes background, mission, vision, and commitment in a concise format.

requirements.text: Implement backend data storage for candidate registrations (including uploaded documents), client enquiries, and contact messages using the single Motoko actor; include timestamps and stable unique IDs for each record.

quotes: All information must go to agency email and also be stored in a secure database.

acceptanceCriteria: Each submission type is stored and can be listed and retrieved by ID.
Records include createdAt timestamp and a unique ID.
Data persists across canister upgrades using stable storage patterns.

requirements.text: Implement secure document upload handling: allow uploading the required candidate documents, store them in the backend associated to the candidate record, and allow authorized admin users to download them via the admin dashboard.

quotes: Secure document upload system

Admin must be able to:

* Download uploaded documents

acceptanceCriteria: Candidate document uploads complete successfully and are tied to the correct candidate record.
Admin can download each uploaded document from the dashboard.
Uploaded documents are not publicly accessible via the public site UI.

requirements.text: Build an Admin dashboard that lets an authorized admin: view candidate registrations and client/contact submissions; filter candidates by Trade/Skill; view submission details; download candidate documents; update and delete records.

quotes:
## 7. Technical Requirements

* Secure database storage
* Admin dashboard to view:

  * Candidate registrations
  * Uploaded documents
  * Client enquiries

Admin must be able to:

* Download uploaded documents
* Filter candidates by skill
* Delete or update records

acceptanceCriteria: Admin dashboard is not accessible to anonymous users.
Candidate list supports filtering by Trade/Skill.
Admin can open a candidate detail view and download each uploaded document.
Admin can update and delete a candidate/enquiry/message and the list reflects changes.

requirements.text: Add admin authentication using Internet Identity and enforce backend authorization checks for all admin-only operations (list all records, download documents, update/delete). Provide a simple allowlist mechanism for admin principals and show the currently signed-in principal in the admin UI for setup.

quotes: Secure database storage
Admin dashboard

acceptanceCriteria: Unauthenticated users cannot access admin data endpoints (backend rejects calls).
Admin UI displays the current principal and whether it is authorized.
Authorized principal(s) can perform admin operations successfully.

requirements.text: Implement basic SEO and Google indexing readiness: set page-specific meta titles/descriptions, add a robots.txt and sitemap, and ensure semantic headings and accessible form labels.

quotes: Be searchable and visible on Google.
Basic SEO (Search Engine Optimization)
Google indexing so the website appears in Google search results

acceptanceCriteria: Each main route has a unique meta title and meta description.
robots.txt and sitemap are available as static files.
Forms use proper label associations and pages use clear H1/H2 structure.

requirements.text: Add a Privacy Policy page addressing POPIA-oriented handling of personal data and documents (what is collected, why, retention, access/deletion requests, and contact details).

quotes:
* Privacy policy page
* POPIA compliance (South Africa)
* Data must not be shared without consent

acceptanceCriteria: Privacy Policy page exists and is linked from the site footer.
Content clearly describes collection and use of personal data and uploaded documents in plain English.

requirements.text: Ensure the public site is fast and mobile-first: optimize images, avoid heavy assets, and ensure forms and buttons are easy to use on small screens.

quotes:
* Mobile responsive (must work perfectly on phones)
* Fast loading speed

acceptanceCriteria: All pages are usable on a phone-sized viewport without horizontal scrolling.
Largest images are sized appropriately and do not cause noticeable layout shifts.
Form interactions (typing, selecting files, submitting) remain responsive on mobile.

requirements.text: Because email sending is disabled, remove/omit all outbound email behaviors and replace them with on-screen confirmation messages and admin dashboard visibility of submissions.

quotes: Proceed without email, and I will build the website so all submissions are stored only in the admin dashboard (no email notifications).

acceptanceCriteria: No code path attempts to send emails.
All form submissions provide an immediate on-screen success message.
Admin can see all submissions that would otherwise have been emailed.

constraints: Do not implement any outbound email functionality (email is disabled).
Backend must remain a single Motoko actor (no additional backend services).
Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui or other immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT; only compose/reuse them.
nonGoals: No third-party authentication providers beyond Internet Identity.
No Google Search Console API integration (provide only on-site SEO readiness, not automated setup).

required: Square favicon based on the provided logo (favicon.dim_512x512.png)
Open Graph share image with the logo on a clean black/yellow/navy background (og-image.dim_1200x630.png)
